forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 8 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. North northeast wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 79. North northeast wind 2 to 8 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
